00001 # include "TREXversion.hh"
00002 
00003 #ifndef TREX_MAJOR // needed as jam does not generate version.hh
00004 # include <trex/version.hh>
00005 #endif 
00006 
00007 # include <sstream>
00008 
00009 
00010 unsigned short TREX::version::major() {
00011   return TREX_MAJOR;
00012 }
00013 
00014 unsigned short TREX::version::minor() {
00015   return TREX_MINOR;
00016 }
00017 
00018 unsigned short TREX::version::release() {
00019   return TREX_PATCH;
00020 }
00021 
00022 unsigned long TREX::version::number() {
00023   unsigned long version = major();
00024   version = 100*version + minor();
00025   version = 100*version + release();
00026   return version;
00027 }
00028 
00029 std::string TREX::version::str() {
00030   std::ostringstream oss;
00031   oss<<major()<<'.'<<minor()<<'.'<<release();
00032   return oss.str();
00033 }
